# Introduction

This repository contains the supplementary material for the conference paper titled "Synthesis after a couple PINTs: Investigating the Role of Pause-Internal Phonetic Particles in Speech Synthesis and Perception".

# TTS Comparison
Below are five sentences in three different conditions, the natural and two text-to-speech conditions, ControlledPINT and AutoPINT.

# Perceptual Experiment
